## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added or updated
- [ ] Examples updated (if user-facing change)
- [ ] `ruff check .` passes
- [ ] `mypy src` passes (if touching typed code)
- [ ] `python -m build` succeeds
- [ ] Tested on Apple Silicon (macOS arm64)
- [ ] `docs/KERNELS.md` updated (if adding/changing catalog kernels)
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` updated (if user-facing change)
